titles.title: U.S. Engagement in Sudanese Peace Act
U.S. Engagement in Sudanese Peace Act
To require the imposition of sanctions with respect to conflict in Sudan, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, the Judiciary, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
